Terobos Lampu Merah, Ojek Online Disenggol TransJakarta
03 Nov 2019, 19:29 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Terobos Lampu Merah, Ojek Online Disenggol TransJakarta

KBRN, Jakarta : Kecelakaan yang melibatkan moda transportasi online dengan TransJakarta kembali terjadi, kali ini menimpa pengemudi/driver Ojek Online (Ojol) dengan Bus TransJakarta di kawasan Mampang Prapatan, Jakarta Selatan, Minggu (3/11/2019) sore.Dugaan saat kejadian, pengemudi Ojol tertabrak bus TransJakarta akibat memaksa untuk melintas walau lampu lalu lintas sudah menyala merah, yang artinya berhenti.Kejadian berlangsung dengan sangat cepat di depan restauran cepat saji kawasan Mampang Prapatan, sekitar pukul 16.58 WIB. Menurut saksi mata yang tak mau disebutkan namanya, pengemudi Ojol melaju dengan membawa penumpang di Jalan Mampang Prapatan mengarah ke Ragunan, Jakarta Selatan. Saat berbelok, lampu lalu lintas sebelumnya sudah menyala merah, namun pengemudi sepeda motor tersebut hendak terus berbelok arah hingga akhirnya dihantam bus TransJakarta.Akibat kejadian tersbeut, jika mengacu pada detikcom, pengemudi ojek online mengalami cedera di kepala hingga mengeluarkan darah.Kecelakaan sempat menyita perhatian warga sekitar hingga jalan raya agak macet. Akan tetapi, petugas Dinas Perhubungan (Dishub) yang sudah berada di lokasi kejadian tadi sore berhasil menguraikan kemacetan. Sementara korban yakni pengemudi Ojol juga langsung dilarikan ke rumah sakit terdekat untuk mendapatkan perawatan medis.Kronologi Kecelakaan Mampang PrapatanPada bagian lain, Butu, pengemudi bus TransJakarta menuturkan, memang benar bahwa pengemudi Ojek Online (Ojol) menerobos lampu merah hingga akhirnya tertabrak bus yang dikemudikannya. Butu lanjut menuturkan, dirinya dalam posisi dari arah Ragunan, Jakarta Selatan, menuju kawasan Kuningan. Ketika traffic light Duren Tiga menyala hijau dan TransJakarta mulai melaju, tiba-tiba ada sepeda motor muncul menerobos busway (jalur TransJakarta)."Saya dari Lebak Bulus arah Senen, ini posisi di lampu merah Duren Tiga. Posisi jalur busway sudah hijau, tiba-tiba sepeda motor (datang) dari sebelah kiri (memotong), akhirnya kejadian (kecelakaan). (Korban) Kena bumper bus," kata Butu kepada wartawan di lokasi kejadian, kawasan Mampang, Jakarta Selatan, Minggu (3/11/2019).Penumpang di sepeda motor itu memang terluka di kepala, dan langsung dibawa ke rumah sakit terdekat untuk menerima perawatan. Sementara penumpangnya, yang ternyata seorang anak Sekolah Dasar (SD), tidak apa-apa, kemungkinan hanya shock dan sudah diambil oleh orang tguanya.Petugas Dishub, Syamsul Arifin membenarkan keterangan Butu, dan mengatakan bahwa driver Ojol sudah dibawa ke rumah sakit, yaitu ke Jakarta Medical Center (JMC). Sedangkan penumpang yang masih duduk di sekolah dasar sudah diambil orang tuanya. (Foto: Ilustrasi Antara)

Breaking the red light, Ojek Online is touched by TransJakarta
03 Nov 2019, 19:29 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Breaking the red light, Ojek Online is touched by TransJakarta

KBRN, Jakarta: An accident involving an online mode of transportation with TransJakarta occurred again, this time affecting the Ojek Online (Ojol) driver / driver with TransJakarta Bus in Mampang Prapatan area, South Jakarta, Sunday (11/03/2019) afternoon. , Ojol's driver was hit by a TransJakarta bus due to force to pass even though the traffic lights were red, which means it stopped. The incident took place very quickly in front of the fast food restaurant in the Mampang Prapatan area, around 16.58 WIB. According to witnesses who did not want to be named, the driver Ojol drove with passengers on Jalan Mampang Prapatan heading to Ragunan, South Jakarta. When turning, the traffic lights were already red before, but the motorbike driver was going to continue to turn direction until finally hit by the TransJakarta bus. As a result of this incident, when referring to detikcom, the online motorcycle taxi driver injured his head to bleed. residents around to the highway rather jammed. However, the Transportation Agency (Dishub) officer who was at the scene this afternoon managed to clear the jam. While the victim, the Ojol driver, was immediately rushed to the nearest hospital to get medical treatment. Mampang Prapatan Chronology Accident In another part, Butu, the TransJakarta bus driver said, it was true that the Ojek Online (Ojol) driver ran a red light and finally was hit by the bus he was driving. Butu continued, he was in a position from the direction Ragunan, South Jakarta, towards the Kuningan area. When the Duren Tiga traffic light lights up green and TransJakarta starts moving, suddenly there is a motorcycle appearing through the busway (TransJakarta lane). "I'm from Lebak Bulus in the direction of Senen, this is the position at the Duren Tiga red light. The position of the busway lane is green, suddenly arrived a motorcycle (coming) from the left (cutting), finally the incident (accident). (Victim) Was hit by a bumper bus, "Butu told reporters at the scene, Mampang, South Jakarta, Sunday (11/03/2019). The passenger on the motorcycle was indeed injured in the head, and was immediately taken to the nearest hospital to receive treatment. While the passengers, who turned out to be an elementary school student, were all right, it was likely only shocked and had been taken by his parents. The Transportation Agency official, Syamsul Arifin confirmed Butu's statement, and said that the Ojol driver had been taken to the hospital, namely to Jakarta Medical Center (JMC). While the passengers who are still sitting in elementary school have taken their parents. (Photo: Intermediate Illustration)
